meaningMnemonic:
The <kanji>occurrence</kanji> of <kanji>truth</kanji> is a <vocabulary>fact</vocabulary>.

事実 is primarily used as a noun, but it can also be used to say something is <vocabulary>factual</vocabulary>. Additionally, in relatively formal writing it can be used as an adverb to mean <vocabulary>in fact</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
